notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription: Write all the steps in the transamination reaction of PMP with α-ketoglutarate plus a lysine residue in the enzyme to give the PLP–enzyme imine plus glutamate.
detailedSolution: Initial imine formation between PMP and α-ketoglutarate is followed by double-bond rearrangement to an isomeric imine and hydrolysis.
